com.mobius.vdrapi
Interface IDocumentServer

All Superinterfaces:
INode
All Known Implementing Classes:
DocumentServer
public interface IDocumentServer
extends INode

This interface represents a document server that has been defined in the Regini profile. Document servers store connection information and login credentials. Different types of document servers are used to support different ways of connecting, such as HLLAPI, TCP/IP, and RPC.

public void changePassword(String oldPassword,
                           String newPassword,
                           String newRecipient)
                    throws AuthenticationException,
                           ViewDirectException
Allows the caller to change the password of the document server. No connection is required for this call.

getPromptForRecipientIDandPassword

public boolean getPromptForRecipientIDandPassword()
Determines if the password requires prompting. If the password is not stored in the profile, it must be prompted for.

Returns the connection protocol this document server uses.

setPassword

public void setPassword(String newPassword)
                 throws DataIOException
Stores a password in the profile for the document server. The input to this function is not encrypted; however, when it is stored in the profile it will be encrypted.

DataIOException
